frontmatter.title: FluxNews Change logs
frontmatter.meta_description: FluxNews is complete app that fully integration Wordpress website

markdownRemark.html:
Version 1.4.1 – 09 May 2020

1. New - compatible with latest Flutter 1.17
2. Update - minor bug fix and performance improve

Version 1.4.0 – 30 Apr 2020

1. New - new Post Management feature allow Author could create new post
2. New - add new PostScreen to show post ID as native screen
3. Update - update the app to compatible with latest Fluxbuiler 1.0.4 - http://fluxbuilder.com/
4. Update - minor bug fix and performance improve

Version 1.3.0 – 02 Apr 2020

1. New - compatible with the Fluxbuilder app - http://fluxbuilder.com
2. New - add new dynamic tab bar config
3. New - add push notification by OneSignal
4. New - add new Google login
5. New - support Apple Sign In
6. New - support l10n language and flutter-intl Android Studio plugin
7. Update - fix Category screen name
8. Update - fix Sharing feature
9. Update - update latest Provider 4.0
10. Update - fix Google Admob and Facebook Advertisement

Version 1.2.2 – 02 Feb 2020 

1. Update - fix cagory image issue
2. Update - minor bug fix and update latest libraries

Version 1.2.1 – 01 Jan 2020

1. Update - fix featureImage issue
2. Update - update mstore-api Wordpress plugin to 2.0 (you can remove json-api plugin from now)
3. Update - minor bug fixes

Version 1.2.0 – 01 Jan 2020

1. New - add new Firebase SMS Login
2. New - add new Google Login
3. New - add new Apple Sign In
4. New - add new Video Integration (Youtube, Video, Facebook)
5. New - Support Admob & Facebook Ads
6. Update - fix build issue 
7. Update - all latest pubspec libraries
8. Update - a lot of bug fix and performance improvement.
9. Update - compatible with latest Flutter 1.12.x

Version 1.1.0 – 11 Nov 2019

1. Update - fix Sharing Button issues
2. Update - fix build script issues 
3. Update - latest library and minor bug fix

Version 1.0.1 – 11 Nov 2019

1. New - support Admob Ads
2. New - support Facebook Ads
3. Update - minor bug fix and performance improvements
4. Update library to support latest Flutter 1.9

Version 1.0.0 – 23 June 2019

1. Great UX design: multi-level categories, quick product filter, super smooth checkout flow, searching keyword history… 
2. Flexible homepage config with Banner Slider, Banner Grouping, Flexible product column views. 
3. User Profile which useful setting: push notification to turn on/off, get notification unread, view wishlist, order history, rate the app on app stores. 
4. Social Logins by Facebook SDK. 
5. Push notification (with notify history) via Firebase 
6. Google Analytic via Firebase. 
7. Easy to restyle and theming by on your branding sites. 
8. Offline local caching. 
9. Compatible with the latest Wordpress blogs. 
10. Compatible with latest Opencart (with free Free Opencart API is included) 
11. Easy registration by SMS Login by Facebook Account Kit 
12. Instance synchronization from mobile to the server. 
13. Perfect splash animation by using new Flare. 
14. Working really well on both iOS and Android with support with 60 frames per second (fps). 
15. Variety of displaying detail blog supported.
